title: Security Alarm, Gourmet Kitchen, Private Covered Balcony or Patio
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 50', 'OR Text', '50', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 715 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'You’re set for an amazing style of modern apartment living at The Tides, a gated community of spacious one- and two-bedroom interiors featuring upgraded appliances, terrific finishes, high-quality amenities, and patio/balcony space to serve as a pleasant extension of your home interior.', 'The common spaces include a sparkling pool in which to enjoy your earned relaxation, a resident clubhouse for group entertainment, and a fitness center equipped with cardiovascular training equipment, a complete free-weight set, and even a wall-mounted television.', 'We’re also near several public schools, college campuses, and shopping centers such as Richmond Hilltop Plaza.', 'Features:', 'Private Covered Balcony or Patio, Soaking Tubs, Security Alarm, Fully Renovated Homes Available, Ceiling Fans, Spectacular Views of the Bay*, Walk-In Pantry*, Upgraded Appliances, Modern Countertops, Central Heating & Air Conditioning, Gourmet Kitchen, In-home Washer & Dryer, In-home Fireplace*, Breakfast Bar, Microwave', '*Restrictions apply.', 'See Sales Associate for details.', 'Community Amenities:', 'Sparkling Pool & Spa, Gated Community, Fitness Center, Covered Parking*, Barbecue Grilling Station, Convenient Location, Clubhouse, Attached Garages*, Business Center', 'Pet Policy', '2 pets per apartment home- breed restriction do apply', 'Income Requirements:', 'Residents are required to make 2.5 times the monthly rent gross income', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'Pnm9Uy9AKj2z']
